description:
以商業攝影的服務對象及目標為研究範疇，進行專題式的實務教學。課程的內容包括：攝影概論、相機原理、鏡頭光學、曝光控制、構圖分析、燈光實務，攝影棚專題實習及數位化影像後製等。

Taking the service target and target of commercial photography as the research scope, the topic-based practical teaching is carried out. The course includes: Introduction to Photography, Camera Principles, Lens Optics, Exposure Control, Composition Analysis, Lighting Practice, Studio Internship and Digital Image Post-production.

syllabus.zh:
1.攝影觀念與技術介紹
2.數位攝影機原理/單眼數位相機解說
3.鏡頭光學原理與應用
4.景深
5.構圖
6.色溫
7.曝光控制
8.攝影棚燈光
9.數位影像處理
10.專題實務（一）靜物攝影
11.專題實務（二）食品攝影
12.專題實務（三）人像攝影
13.專題實務（四）設計攝影
syllabus.en:
1.Photography concept and technology
2.Digital Camera Principle / Digital Camera Interpretation
3.Lens optics principle and application
4.Depth of field
5.Composition
6.Color Temperature
7.Exposure
8.Studio lighting
9.Special Projects I : Still Life Photography
10.Special Projects II: Food Photography
11.Special Projects III: Portrait Photography
12.Special Projects IV: Design Photography

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 了解攝影的相關技巧並能夠熟練地操作
將攝影技巧運用於商品行銷
對於光線的敏銳度與環境感知能力培養
